title: DDFP 474: 2016 Redskins, Best Offensive Triplets & Best QB Draft classes
itunes:title: DDFP 474: 2016 Redskins, Best Offensive Triplets & Best QB Draft classes
description:
Shek is joined by Dan Hanzus and Dan Hellie to discuss the NFL's best offensive trios going into 2016, as well as the all-time best quarterback draft classes. The guys also determine who they'd like to be introduced by in their own Hall of Fame inductions and whether or not Devin Hester is destined for the Pro Football Hall of Fame. Plus, the guys wrap the show by reviewing the Washington Redskins' 2016 schedule in the latest installment of "On the Record."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
